title: Rithvik Dhanjani and Bharti Singh to host Zee Rishtey Awards 2016!! | 37039
text:
Rithvik Dhanjani and Bharti Singh to host Zee Rishtey Awards 2016!! Rithvik Dhanjani and Bharti Singh to host Zee Rishtey Awards 2016!! It's laughter combined with charm this time!! Saturday, February 04, 2017 | 12:33:27 PM IST (+05:30 GMT) 4 Comments | By Tellybuzz Team 
Known for their knack of entertaining viewers as hosts of various awards shows and events, heartthrob Rithvik Dhanjani and stand-up comedienne Bharti Singh have been roped in to host Zee TV 's annual awards ceremony, celebrating relationships between its family of stars and the channel's loyal viewers - Zee Rishtey Awards 2016. The two are a complete entertainment package with their spontaneity, impeccable comic timing and their ability to leave the crowd in splits. The two perfectly complement each other, with Rithvik grabbing eyeballs as much for his good looks as for his witty one-liners and Bharti leaving audiences regaling with her slapstick comedy and hilarious punches. Viewers are in for a non-stop laugh-a-thon with both coming together to host the awards ceremony this year! 
An interesting canter activity has been lined up by the channel wherein initiatives will be undertaken in 40 cities within a span of 7 days to announce the nominations and make vote appeals to the viewers for their favorite jodi's, actors, actresses, shows. The activity will be conducted at high- footfall areas in regions including Uttar Pradesh, Haryana, Delhi, Punjab, Gujarat, Mumbai, Maharashtra. The votes will be collected through physical forms and the results will be declared on-air on Sunday, 19th Feb at 7pm on Zee TV . In order to make this activity more exciting and engaging, interesting contests will be held across cities with the viewers, where they'll get a chance to earn Zee TV gift hampers. Few selected and lucky winners will also be invited to Mumbai to watch their favorite Zee TV stars LIVE on-ground at Zee Rishtey Awards 2016! 
This year, Zee Rishtey Awards 2016 will see the biggest stars across television and film industry descend on to stage to create an evening that will be etched in your minds forever. Abhi's star power, Pragya's simplicity, the Jamai's charm, Mehek's innocent vulnerability, Raja's love and Rani's elegance will all come alive on the star studded stage. User Rating
